description: Base 3 digital convolution sequence, (with smallest digits).
links: Michael Gilleland, Some Self-Similar Integer Sequences
mathematica: c[ 0, _ ] := 1; c[ n_, b_ ] := c[ n, b ]=Module[ {mul}, mul=IntegerDigits[ n, b ]; Table[ c[ i, b ], {i, 0, Length[ mul ]-1} ].mul ]
author: _David W. Wilson_, _Wouter Meeussen_
